text: Apni Shopify admin mein login karein aur 'Settings' pe click karein.  'Policies' section dhundhein.
Apni store kay liye relevant policies likhein jaise refund policy, shipping policy aur privacy policy.  Saaf aur concise likhein.

step_heading: Step 3: Policies Ko Apne Store Mein Add Karein
text: Shopify admin mein 'Policies' section mein apni likhi hui policies ko copy aur paste karein.  Har section mein sahi policy paste karein.
Sab policies sahi se check karne kay baad, 'Save' pe click karein. Ab apki policies apki store pe live hain!
